items.ja: 'Bonds the embodiment of West Ham's spirit'
items.en: 'Bonds the embodiment of West Ham's spirit'
items.text_for_match: 'Bonds the embodiment of West Ham's spirit' Billy Bonds, who has died at the age of 79, was one of the greatest players ever to represent West Ham United and one of the finest never to win a full England cap, writes Phil McNulty.
